#coding: utf-8

import os
from api.member import Member
from api.shop import Shop
from ui.weixin import Menu
from api.weixin import Weixin
from api.market import Market
from api.terminal import Terminal
from api.myvkd import MyVkd
from param.shop import ShopParam
from param.member import MemberParam
from param.market import MarketParam
from param.weixin import WeixinParam
from param.terminal import TerminalParam



ROOT_DIR = os.path.abspath(
    os.path.dirname(__file__)
)



[文档]class Config(object):
    '''
    基础配置
    '''

    CAPTCHA = '1111'
    PROXY = {'http' : 'http://127.0.0.1:8888'}
    URL = 'http://testwkd.snsshop.net/login/index'
    INIT_FLAG = 0
    ENV = 'default'
    SSID = None
    #COOKIE = None
    DEBUG = 'no'
    API = {
        'member':Member,
        'weixin':Weixin,
        'shop':Shop,
        'market':Market,
        'myvkd':MyVkd,
        'terminal':Terminal,
    }
    MODULES = {
        'member':Member,
        'shop':Shop,
		'myvkd':MyVkd,
        'market':Market,
    }

    MB_PARAM = MemberParam
    MK_PARAM = MarketParam
    WX_PARAM = WeixinParam
    WX_MENU = Menu

    SHOP_PARAM = ShopParam
    TM_PARAM = TerminalParam


    LOADED_API = {}
    LOADED_MODULES = {}



    @staticmethod

[文档]    def get_flag():
        return Config.INIT_FLAG


    @staticmethod

[文档]    def set_flag(flag):
        Config.INIT_FLAG = flag


    @staticmethod

[文档]    def get_cookie():
        return {'PHPSESSID': Config.SSID}


    @property
    def cookie(self):
        return {'PHPSESSID': Config.SSID}

    @staticmethod

[文档]    def load_api_mod(*params):
        for mod in params:
            if mod in Config.API and mod not in Config.LOADED_API:
                api = Config.API[mod]
                Config.LOADED_API[mod] = api()

        return True


    @staticmethod

[文档]    def get_api_mod(*params):
        modules = {}
        for mod in params:
            if mod in Config.API and mod not in Config.LOADED_API:
                api = Config.API[mod]
                Config.LOADED_API[mod] = api()
            modules[mod] = Config.LOADED_API[mod]
        if len(modules) == 1:
            return modules[params[0]]
        else:
            return modules


    @staticmethod

[文档]    def load_module(*params):
        for param in params:
            if param in Config.MODULES and param not in Config.LOADED_MODULES:
                module = Config.MODULES[param]
                Config.LOADED_MODULES[param] = module()

        return True



    HEADERS = {
        'Accept-Language': 'zh-CN,zh;q=0.8',
        'Upgrade-Insecure-Requests':'1',
        'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate, sdch',
        'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/51.0.2704.103 Safari/537.36',
        'Accept': 'application/json, text/plain, */*',
        'Content-Type': 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded',
        'YT': 'for debug'
        }
    HEADERS_JSON = {
        'Accept-Language': 'zh-CN,zh;q=0.8',
        'Upgrade-Insecure-Requests':'1',
        'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate, sdch',
        'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/51.0.2704.103 Safari/537.36',
        'Accept': 'application/json, text/plain, */*',
        'Content-Type':'application/json;charset=UTF-8',
        'YT': 'for debug'
    }




[文档]class AutoConfig(Config):
    '''
    微客多自动化测试环境配置(自动化测试专用)
    '''
    USERNAME = '20170108@qq.com'
    PASSWORD = '123456'
    USER_ID = '13764904'
    MEMBER_ID = '380'
    URL = 'http://testwkd.snsshop.net'
    URL_TERMINAL = 'http://testwkdshopadmin.snsshop.net'
    WX_URL = 'http://wkdianshang.testwkdwx.snsshop.net/wkdianshang'
    TITLE = u"微客多后台管理系统"

[文档]def get_config(env):
    if env == "auto":
        return AutoConfig()
    elif env == "test":
        return TestConfig()
    elif env == "beta":
        return BetaConfig()
    elif env == "dev":
        return DevConfig()
    elif env == "ci":
        return CiConfig()
    else:
        print("Please input a legal env string,eg. 'test','wkd','auto','dev','ci'.")
        return None
